entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
